findings.message: Compiler version 0.8.19 does not satisfy the ^0.5.8 semver requirement
findings.name: compiler-version

findings.message: Contract name must be in CamelCase
findings.name: contract-name-camelcase

findings.message: Explicitly mark visibility in function (Set ignoreConstructors to true if using solidity >=0.7.0)
findings.name: func-visibility

findings.message: Avoid making time-based decisions in your business logic
findings.name: not-rely-on-time
